content:
So building a World Bubble
just means living life to the fullest~!

If you don't like fishing, you can pull weeds,
If you don't like pulling weeds, you can gather resources,
If you don't like gathering, you can craft items...

There's always a way to earn some Joycoins,
and saving up for rent doesn't seem so hard anymore!

Every effort to live well
will be acknowledged, encouraged, and rewarded,
even simple things like gathering, fishing, or weeding...

Fishing, gathering, crafting...
You can earn Joy Rice from many daily activities,
